code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate abdominal pain and Stomach. These symptoms are present for about 7 days. she is a white f trademark attorney aged 38 years. she denies drinking alcohol she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 67 in, Weight 101 lbs, Temperature 97.8 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

td.content: s:38 YO white female presents with 3 months history of moderate abdominal pain. she does not smoke denies any alcohol use o:Height 68 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Endoscopic therapy reduction - stomach.

td.content: s:a 39 yo f trademark attorney presents with increased moderate abdominal pain over 4 months. denies any alcohol use she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 68 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, HEENT: WNL, Abdomen = RUQ tenderness and nondistended, palpable liver a:Abdominal Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed pantoprazole - 40 mg daily, and ordered Reticulocyte Count.
